TextLibrary.Text: Khrona
I can't stop Gruulkar. Even with his new weapon destroyed, he's still set to march on Dhun-Kor.
I can't stop Gruulkar. Even with his new weapon destroyed, he's still set to march on Dhun-Kor.
I can't stop Gruulkar. Even with his new weapon destroyed, he's still set to march on Dhun-Kor.
I can't stop Gruulkar. Even with his new weapon destroyed, he's still set to march on Dhun-Kor.
What will you do?
What will you do?
What will you do?
What will you do?
There's only one option left. I have to head south, lie in wait, and try to surprise him.
There's only one option left. I have to head south, lie in wait, and try to surprise him.

There's only one option left. I have to head south, lie in wait, and try to surprise him.
An old trick the Goblin Raiders used was to hide in a Scorpion Hole and wait for their target to pass by.

I've seen Scorpions near Snake Fang. I'll try there.
